description: '''The Hidden Cameras''' are a Canadian [[indie pop]] band. Fronted by singer-songwriter [[Joel Gibb]], the band consists of a varying roster of musicians who play what Gibb once described as "[[gay]] [[Church music|church]] [[folk music]]". Their live performances have been elaborate, high-energy shows, featuring [[go-go dancers]] in [[balaclava (clothing)|balaclavas]], a choir, and a string section.
